descriptionHtml:
EN
You were in Sovngarde and have alduin defeated but his soul not in you recorded you were then at Arngeir and have with him about alduin spoken he said that he maybe yet on the life is. a man named Luhnartch waiting on you goes to him and then begins a quest that you again alduin encounters becoming

Thanks to muppetpuppet for the permission for Meshes and Textures of his Moonpath to Elsweyr to utilize

EN
Moonpath to Elsweyr: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10738

Here is the german version: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32340

EN2
\"In Sovngarde, you defeated Alduin.. but his soul escaped you grasp. Upon your return to the mortal world, a old friend, Arngeir shares to you that this battle may not be over at that Alduin may yet live again. Journey forth once again into the lands and find the one called Luhnartch, he will show you the path to find the world eater once again.\"
author: Master Chief
